The Gazette of the Democratic Socialist Republic of Sri Lanka  
ɼ  ලංකා  ȝජාතාǦƵක  සමාජවා Ǐ  ජනරජ ෙɏ  ගැසŸ  පƴ ය 
අƯ ɪෙශෂ   
අංක 2209/27 - 2021 ජනවාɜ මස 05 වැǧ අඟහɞවාදා - 2021.01.05 
 
  No. 2209/27 –  TUESDAY, JANUARY 05, 2021 
EXTRAORDINARY 
This Gazette Extraordinary can be downloaded from www.documents.gov.lk 
(Published by Authority) 
 
PART I : SECTION (I)  —  GENERAL 
 
Government  Notifications 
 
1A - PG 5247 —  85 (2021/01) 
 
FOREST CONSERVATION ORDINANCE   
THE order under section 3. that has to be read with Section 64.(1) of the Forest Conservation Ordina nce (Chapter 451), 
as Act, No. 13 of 1966, as amended by Acts, No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 
of 2009. 
  
The Order 
 
By virtue of powers vested in me by section 3. of the Forest Conservation Ordinance (Chapter 451) Ac t, No. 13 of 
1966, As amended by Acts No. 56 of 1979, No. 13 of 1982, No. 84 of 1988, No. 23 of 1995 and No. 65 o f 2009, I, 
Wimalaweera Dissanayake, State Minister of Wildlife Conservation Protection Programmes including Electric Fence and 
Ditch Construction and Re-Forestation and Wildlife Resources Development declare the Maduruoya  Forest of 398.08 
Hectares bounded by the limit set forth in the schedule hereto as  Maduruoya Reserved Forest from 05th, day of 
January 2021. 
 
 WIMALAWEERA DISSANAYAKE, 
 State Minister of Wildlife Protection  
 Adoption of Safety Measures including the  
 Construction of Electrical fences and   
 Trenches and Reforestation and forest  
 Resources Development. 
  
05th day of January, 2020, 
Battaramulla, 
State Ministry of Wildlife  
 Protection Adoption of safety  
Measures including the  Construction of   
Electrical Fences and Trenches and  
Reforestation and Resources  Development. 

<!-- page 2 -->

2 A I ෙකʣටස : (I) ෙඡදය - ɼ ලංකා ȝජාතාǦƵක සමාජවාǏ ජනරජෙɏ අƯ ɪෙශෂ ගැසŸ පƴය - 2021.01.05 
PART  I : Sec (1) – GAZETTE EXTRAORDINARY OF THE DEMOCRATIC SOCIALIS T REPUBLIC OF SRI LANKA – 05.01.2021 
SCHEDULE 
 
The state land of 398.08 ha. Located within Welikanda  Divisional Secretary Division of Polonnaruwa District 
in the North Central Province of Sri Lanka located Within the area depicted by the following geodesic coordinates 
(Survey method – Geodesic coordinates EPSG : 5234 method)

The land area surrounded by the straight line formed by joining the points that start from (E.249890 , N. 291079) and 
from there up to starting point (E. 249862, N. 291049) 
 
Extent: 398.08 Ha.
